definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: Down town Naperville gives you a feel of a charming small town; yet with a big city dynamics. There are many restaurants;
sentences.chinese: 瑞珀市中心是一個迷人的小鎮，但也有大城市的活力。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I hitchhiked my way to a small village several miles away from London.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我一路搭乘便車去離倫敦幾英里外的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: There was a priory in the small town.
sentences.chinese: 這個小鎮裏有個小修道院。

sentences.english: Rilong is a small town at the foot of Siguniang Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 日隆是四姑娘山下的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: Adam is your average working-class guy living in small-town America.
sentences.chinese: 亞當是普通工薪階層的人生活在美國的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: Small-town girl meets mysterious drifter boy, they fall in love.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮的女孩，男孩遇到神祕流浪漢，他們墜入愛河。

sentences.english: To hit this nowhere zilch town, and you can't?
sentences.chinese: 足以讓這個小鎮翻天覆地而你卻不能去？

sentences.english: After liberation , great changes have taken place in the small town .
sentences.chinese: 解放後，小鎮發生了巨大的變化。

sentences.english: We continued our walk in the small town St. Ulrich.
sentences.chinese: 我們繼續步行於聖烏爾立赫小鎮。

sentences.english: Sample shops display all purchasable goods, even in small towns.
sentences.chinese: 樣本商店展示所有可購買的物品，甚至是小鎮。

sentences.english: After a prolonged siege, the town was rendered up to the insurgents.
sentences.chinese: 經過長時間包圍之後，這個小鎮已被起義軍攻克。

sentences.english: The sky started to grow lighter and the shadow in the little town less dark.
sentences.chinese: 天色漸漸發白，小鎮裏的陰影處也慢慢亮了起來。

sentences.english: Before long, the Red Cross began to pitch tents on high ground north of town.
sentences.chinese: 不久，紅十字會開始在小鎮北面的高地上架設帳篷。

sentences.english: The little town mushroomed into a big city.
sentences.chinese: 這座小鎮迅速發展成一座大城市。

sentences.english: I am in a cafe in a town in north Wales.
sentences.chinese: 我正在北威爾士一個小鎮的咖啡店裏。

sentences.english: The town was Li lights dim, some mixed contact is not clear.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮飄漓的燈火，朦朧得有些混觸不清。

definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
